billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Applies the provisions of the human rights law to all employers regardless of the number of persons in their employ excluding certain family operated businesses
summary: Applies the provisions of the human rights law to all employers regardless of the number of persons in their employ; excludes from the definition of employers those employers where at least two-thirds of the employees are family members or spouses of family members of the employer.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to expanding the type and number of employers covered by the provisions of the human rights law
